trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> security token using the X.509 certificate's subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰識別碼子句，這個子句會識別使用 X.509 憑證之主體金鑰識別碼延伸的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause> does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時，通常並不需要使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考是指不包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause> class to reference a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token using the X.509 certificate's subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause> 類別，即可參考使用 X.509 憑證之主體金鑰識別碼的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.GetX509SubjectKeyIdentifier%2A> method returns the subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.GetX509SubjectKeyIdentifier%2A> 方法會傳回主體金鑰識別碼延伸。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] supports the following types of security token references for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] 支援 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 安全性權杖的下列安全性權杖參考型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的主體金鑰識別碼，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ski" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ski" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 包含 X.509 憑證的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a key identifier clause can be created for the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出是否可以為指定的 X.509 憑證建立金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a key identifier clause can be created for <paramref name="certificate" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果能建立 <paramref name="certificate" /> 的金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause can be created when the `certificate` parameter contains the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> extension.
trans-unit.target: 當 `certificate` 參數包含 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> 延伸時，就能夠建立金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得主體金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，其中包含主體金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate to compare.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />，其中包含要比較的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the key identifier of the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出這個執行個體的金鑰識別碼是否相等於指定之 X.509 憑證的金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="certificate" /> has the same subject key identifier as the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 與目前執行個體具有相同的主體金鑰識別碼，則為 <paramref name="certificate" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.Matches%2A> method compares the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> extension for the two X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.Matches%2A> 方法會比較兩個 X.509 憑證的 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> 延伸。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.ToString%2A> method returns the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.ToString%2A> 方法會傳回主體金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> to create the key identifier clause for.
trans-unit.target: 要建立金鑰識別碼子句的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a key identifier clause using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證來建立金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when a key identifier clause can be created for the specified X.509 certificate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以建立指定之 X.509 憑證的金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause> key identifier clause can be created for the X.509 certificate when it contains a subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果 X.509 憑證包含主體金鑰識別碼，就可以為該憑證建立 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause> 金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
